articles.author: Zoya Sheftalovich
articles.title: Putin offers to sell minerals to Trump, including from Russian-occupied Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The proposal comes as Kyiv and Washington negotiate a deal on critical minerals in Ukraine.
articles.content: Speaking in a televised interview after convening a meeting on development of the rare earth metals industry on Monday, Putin said Ukraines potential critical minerals deal with the U.S. does not con… [+1529 chars]
